tool_description: Performs detailed mineralogical analysis using XRD, petrographic microscopy, and SEM-EDS to identify and quantify mineral phases in rock and soil samples.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier for the prepared sample

analysis_techniques.description: Analytical techniques to use: XRD, petrography, SEM_EDS, or QEMSCAN

sample_preparation_type.description: Sample preparation: powder, thin_section, polished_section, or grain_mount

error_messages: Sample not found: The provided sample_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid analysis_techniques: Use one or more of [XRD, petrography, SEM_EDS, QEMSCAN].
Invalid sample_preparation_type: Use one of [powder, thin_section, polished_section, grain_mount].
Incompatible technique-preparation: The selected technique is incompatible with the preparation type.
usage: Provide sample_id, analysis_techniques, and sample_preparation_type; optionally set quantitative_analysis. The tool performs mineralogical analysis and returns mineral identification and abundance data.

mineral_abundances.description: Abundance percentages for each identified mineral

texture_description.description: Description of sample texture and fabric

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each mineral identification
